summary: REQ-5/6/7 appear implemented: useGetUserProfile now parses a real Principal via Principal.fromText with error handling, and PostCard/CommentsSection/GroupPostCard/GroupCommentsSection now display profile.username when available with principal-based fallbacks and username-derived avatar initials. Some additional, unrequested behavior was added around group comment refetching and error-specific messaging.

hallucinated_features.description: After creating a group comment, the UI explicitly refetches group comments to update the list, and adds special-case error handling for authorization/member-only failures with new toast messages.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 only asks to display usernames from profiles with fallbacks; it does not request changes to comment submission/refetch logic or new authorization-specific UX messaging.
